page.title: 01Greenfields Industry Estate
page.content: The main feature of this area is the industrial estate located in a disused army camp on the northern side of the B3142 (the only main road crossing the area; other transport links being the numerous farm tracks covering the landscape) at the southern end of the village of Piddlehinton. Facilities include an enterprise park. A pistol and rifle range, a motorcycle test centre, a council education store, a rugby pitch & clubhouse, residential & touring caravan sites & a small royal signals training facility (not permanently manned). The undulating landscape is for the most part covered by farmland (both intensively managed grassland & land cultivated for other crops) & there are two major farms in the area. Several small woods & copses & numerous tumuli (9 in all) are dotted across the landscape and a
